name: Smart Cockpit 2024
tagline: Steering towards a new horizon of smart cockpit
description: The smart cockpit serves as the third living space beyond the home and office. AUO is dedicated to transcending dimensions with technological applications to realize an emerging riding experience. At hes CES venue, AUO will showcase a brand new smart cockpit that closely connects with user's diverse needs, as well as innovative applications and designs within the vechile cabin. By flexibly utilizing the space inside the cabin, it brings an immersive and captivating visual feast, satisfying the all-around user experience for drivers and passengers.

name: Micro LED Display
tagline: Next-generation display technology achieves cockpit design aesthetics in one step
description: AUO integrates top-tier Micro LED display and sensing technologies, covering spatial applications in every aspect of the cockpit. AUO embeds hidden control buttons on the steering wheel grip, creating an Intuitive Steering Wheel Touch Display, hich is linked to the Immersive Panoramic HUD on the front windshield. This design not only meets ergonomic standards and enhances the beauty of the steering wheel but also allows drivers to visualize controls such as the air conditioning system or volume on the windshield, enhancing the safety of driving. Moreover, the integrated Blended HMI Surface can match different textures of the cockpit's decorative panels, allowing the display to blend perfectly with the panels and only reveal itself during operation, thus achieving aesthetic design in the cockpit.

name: Interactive Smart Window
tagline: A highly useful integrated smart window
description: AUO's Interactive Transparent Smart Window integrates a highly transparent Micro LED display into the car's side window, equipped with touch functionality for entertainment, online video conferencing, and safety warning information display, leading the way in immersive cockpit innovation.

name: Hidden Control UI
tagline: A hidden user interface of central control
description: AUO combines cutting-edge Micro LED display and sensing technologies to create a Concealed Central Control Human-Machine Interface, which can be coordinated with the cockpit's decorative panels to present different textures. The display integrates seamlessly with the cockpit panels, revealing itself only during operation, thus crafting cockpit design aesthetics and creating an intuitive touch experience.
